text: Hi all, I have a customer trying to build a SPA  in HubSpot using Vue and would like to use <https://router.vuejs.org/guide/essentials/history-mode.html#example-server-configurations|History Mode> to  remove hash mode from the URLs. The doc states that in order to use History mode you need “add a simple catch-all fallback route to your server” is this something that would be possible? thanks!
